body:
MKL Slice is not in a separate file because it is not optimized by MKL API yet.
Current optimization is to speed up Eigen version using OpenMP.

Another reason for not using a separate file is build rules for Slice op. They are
currently written in such a way (using slice* prefix) that adding mkl_slice would
require sizable changes to the build file.

Another reason for not using a separate file is build rules for Slice op. They are
currently written in such a way (using slice* prefix) that adding mkl_slice would
require sizable changes to the build file.
body_text:
MKL Slice is not in a separate file because it is not optimized by MKL API yet.
Current optimization is to speed up Eigen version using OpenMP.
Another reason for not using a separate file is build rules for Slice op. They are
currently written in such a way (using slice* prefix) that adding mkl_slice would
require sizable changes to the build file.
